long_description: The Osprey Karve 16 snow pack accompanies you to the untracked powder just above the lifts, comfortably carrying essential winter gear and skis or a snowboard. The Osprey Karve 16 snow pack carries a snowboard vertically or skis diagonally. Panel-loading pack opens to large internal compartment and supplies space for extra food, clothing and gear; includes external sleeve for snow probes and a shovel handle. Zippered front pocket is designed to carry goggles and a shovel blade. EVA foam harness features an insulated hydration sleeve and an adjustable sternum strap (hydration reservoir not included). Snow-shedding fabric reduces snow buildup while the pack sits in the snow, and a fully padded front panel reduces wear from ski edges. Compression straps stabilize the load. Closeout.
short_description: The Osprey Karve 16 snow pack accompanies you to the untracked powder just above the lifts, comfortably carrying essential winter gear and skis or a snowboard.
